author: CBC News
title: Russian invasion adds new anxiety to an uncertain global economy | CBC News
description: Despite convincing warnings from the U.S. State Department and others in the know, the global economy — already reeling from the pandemic and its economic effects — is demonstrating new signs of the jitters.
content: You might have thought that with thousands of Russian troops lined up on the Ukraine frontier and certain warnings from the U.S. State Department of an imminent invasion, despite the enormous human c… [+6284 chars]
